data.message: I will keep my hate thank you.
Can and should are different things.

actually, when the Segway came out, nobody "hated on it" at all. what *actually* happened was people hated on the buildup that surrounded it, when other folks made comments about "redesigning cities around it".  neither Mr Kamen nor his company ever offered such bloviating, and in fact attempted to REDUCE the hype around the product.
